get card info p2
func:
msg.payload = [
    flow.get('p2card'+msg.payload, 'file'),
    flow.get('p2card'+msg.payload+'num1', 'file'),
    flow.get('p2card'+msg.payload+'num2', 'file'),
    flow.get('p2card'+msg.payload+'num3', 'file'),
    flow.get('p2card'+msg.payload+'num4', 'file'),
    flow.get('p2ele'+msg.payload, 'file'),
    'blue',
    flow.get('p2cardname'+msg.payload, 'file')
    ];
return msg;

sudden death trigger
func:
if (
    (flow.get('card1', 'file') != '0_blank') &&
    (flow.get('card2', 'file') != '0_blank') &&
    (flow.get('card3', 'file') != '0_blank') &&
    (flow.get('card4', 'file') != '0_blank') &&
    (flow.get('card5', 'file') != '0_blank') &&
    (flow.get('card6', 'file') != '0_blank') &&
    (flow.get('card7', 'file') != '0_blank') &&
    (flow.get('card8', 'file') != '0_blank') &&
    (flow.get('card9', 'file') != '0_blank') &&
    (flow.get('p1score', 'file') == '5') &&
    (flow.get('p2score', 'file') == '5')
    )
     {
        node.send({"payload":"Sudden Death"})
    }

name: sudden death logic
func:
if (msg.payload == 'Sudden Death') {
    if (flow.get('color1', 'file') == 'blue') {
        node.send({"payload": [
        flow.get('card1', 'file'),
        flow.get('card1num1', 'file'),
        flow.get('card1num2', 'file'),
        flow.get('card1num3', 'file'),

name: css
format:
<link href="https://unpkg.com/nes.css@latest/css/nes.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=0.3">
<meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-title" content="TripleTriad">
<meta name="description" content="A card game popular among SeeD.">
<meta name="author" content="Inskipp">
<style>
    .nes-btn.is-warning {
        width: 240px;
        padding: 1px 1px;
    }
    .nes-btn.is-primary {
        width: 240px;
        padding: 1px 1px;
    }
    .nes-btn.is-error {
        width: 240px;
        padding: 1px 1px;
        background-color: #C52020 !important;
    }
    .nes-btn.is-error:hover {
        width: 240px;
        padding: 1px 1px;
        background-color: #B20000 !important;
    }
    .mat
    {
      position: absolute;
      top: 0px;
      left: 0px;
      width: 768px;
      height: 768px;
      max-width: 100%;
      border-style: solid;
      border-color: black;
    }
    .playercolor1
    {
      position: absolute;
      top: 0px;
      left: 0px;
    }
    .playercolor2
    {
      position: absolute;
      top: 0px;
      left: 256px;
    }
    .playercolor3
    {
      position: absolute;
      top: 0px;
      left: 512px;
    }
    .playercolor4
    {
      position: absolute;
      top: 256px;
      left: 0px;
    }
    .playercolor5
    {
      position: absolute;
      top: 256px;
      left: 256px;
    }
    .playercolor6
    {
      position: absolute;
      top: 256px;
      left: 512px;
    }
    .playercolor7
    {
      position: absolute;
      top: 512px;
      left: 0px;
    }
    .playercolor8
    {
      position: absolute;
      top: 512px;
      left: 256px;
    }
    .playercolor9
    {
      position: absolute;
      top: 512px;
      left: 512px;
    }

      top: 0px;
      left: 0px;

      top: 0px;
      left: 256px;
    }

name: music
format:
<script>
var myAudio = document.getElementById("myAudio");

function togglePlay() {
  return myAudio.paused ? myAudio.play() : myAudio.pause();
};
</script>
<audio id="myAudio" src="/FF8/audio/music.wav" preload="auto" loop></audio>
<button type="button" class="nes-btn is-warning" onclick="togglePlay()" ng-click="send({payload: 'toggle',topic: 'music'})">MUSIC</button>

name: info
format:
Info.

{{msg.payload}}

rules.to: If two or more adjacent ranks are the same, cards are captured.
Edges of the board are counted as A and S ranks for the Same rule.
If placed touching two cards and the ranks touching the cards plus the opposing rank equal the same sum, then both cards are captured.
If game ends in a draw, a sudden death occurs in which a new game is started but the cards are distributed on the side of the color they were on at the end of the game.
When an elemental card is placed on a corresponding element, each rank goes up a point. When any card is placed on a non-matching element, each rank goes down a point.

name: fan
func: return msg;
